subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Tips and Tricks.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: Whether you're traveling solo, with kids, or in a group, this guide will help you make the most of your trip.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text:
This guide will take you through a variety of activities and must -see attractions to help you plan an 
unforgettable trip.
This guide will take you through the histories of major cities, famous historical sites, and other points of interest to help you plan an enriching and unforgettable trip.

Use this guide to plan 
your culinary journey and savor the tastes of the South of France, creating memories that will 
linger long after your trip has ended.

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Tips and Tricks.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text:
A heavy 
coat, gloves, and a hat. 
• Footwear:  Waterproof boots and comfort able walking shoes.  
• Accessories:  A scarf, sunglasses for sunny winter days, and a travel -sized hand 
warmer.
